column4: Hey. I tried installing Ubuntu on my laptop and it just wont work. It gets to the main menu thing but when i tell it to install the screen just goes blank and nothing happens (i left it on for about an hour just in case). The disc is fine; im running it on my PC right now. My laptop meets all the requirements so what's going on?
might try using the acpi=off parameter for boot.
might try using the acpi=off parameter for boot.
press F6 on the livecd boot screen, and if it's jaunty just tick it in the menu.
